### Step Two Solution

The environment setup includes external integrations with Hugging Face, Gmail, and Yahoo Finance API for enhanced functionality. The system employs Elastic Search indexing for sub-second queries and data enrichment pipelines for advanced metrics. The processing environment includes IBM Code Engine for containerized PDF generation and watsonx.ai for hosting scalable models.

<img src="/images/007/Resource_List.png" alt="resources" class="responsive-img">

The environment was set up via IBM Cloud, leveraging the following technologies:
- **watsonx Orchestrate**: Automates workflows like TLH reporting.
- **watsonx.ai**: Hosts scalable AI models.
- **watsonx Discovery**: Provides advanced search capabilities (ElasticSearch).
- **Code Engine**: Executes containerized tasks like PDF generation.
- **Kibana**: Visualizes ElasticSearch data.
